00018    /* 
00019    * Default constructor.
00020    */
00021    Distribution::Distribution() 
00022     : histogram_(),
00023       min_(0.0),
00024       max_(0.0),
00025       binWidth_(0.0),
00026       nBin_(0),
00027       nSample_(0),
00028       nReject_(0)
00029    {}
00030    
00031    /* 
00032    * Copy constructor.
00033    */
00034    Distribution::Distribution(const Distribution& other) 
00035     : histogram_(),
00036       min_(other.min_),
00037       max_(other.max_),
00038       binWidth_(other.binWidth_),
00039       nBin_(other.nBin_),
00040       nSample_(other.nSample_),
00041       nReject_(other.nReject_)
00042    {
00043       if (nBin_ > 0) {
00044          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() != 0);
00045          histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00046          for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00047             histogram_[i] = other.histogram_[i];
00048          }
00049       } else {
00050          assert(nBin_ == 0);
00051          assert(histogram_.capacity() == 0);
00052          assert(nSample_ == 0);
00053          assert(nReject_ == 0);
00054       }
00055    }
00056    
00057    /* 
00058    * Assignment operator.
00059    */
00060    Distribution& Distribution::operator = (const Distribution& other) 
00061    {
00062       // Check for self assignment
00063       if (this == &other) return *this;
00064 
00065       // Check validity of other object
00066       if (other.nBin_ > 0) {
00067          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() != 0);
00068       } else {
00069          assert(other.nBin_ == 0);
00070          assert(other.histogram_.capacity() == 0);
00071          assert(other.nSample_ == 0);
00072          assert(other.nReject_ == 0);
00073       }
00074 
00075       // Assign primitive values
00076       min_      = other.min_;
00077       max_      = other.max_;
00078       binWidth_ = other.binWidth_;
00079       nBin_     = other.nBin_;
00080       nSample_  = other.nSample_;
00081       nReject_  = other.nReject_;
00082 
00083       // Allocate and copy histogram, if necessary
00084       if (nBin_ > 0) {
00085          histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00086          for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00087             histogram_[i] = other.histogram_[i];
00088          }
00089       }
00090 
00091       return *this;
00092    }
00093    
00094    /* 
00095    * Destructor.
00096    */
00097    Distribution::~Distribution() 
00098    {}

00100    /* 
00101    * Read parameters and initialize.
00102    */
00103    void Distribution::readParam(std::istream& in)
00104    {
00105       readBegin(in,"Distribution");
00106       read<double>(in, "min", min_);
00107       read<double>(in, "max", max_);
00108       read<int>(in,   "nBin", nBin_);
00109       binWidth_  = (max_ - min_)/double(nBin_);
00110       histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00111       clear();
00112       readEnd(in);
00113    }
00114   
00115    /*
00116    * Set parameters and initialize.
00117    *
00118    * \param min  lower bound of range
00119    * \param max  upper bound of range
00120    * \param nBin number of bins in range [min, max]
00121    */
00122    void Distribution::setParam(double min, double max, int nBin)
00123    {
00124       min_   = min;
00125       max_   = max;
00126       nBin_  = nBin;
00127       binWidth_  = (max_ - min_)/double(nBin_);
00128       histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00129       clear();
00130    }  
00131    
00132    /* 
00133    * Zero all accumulators.
00134    */
00135    void Distribution::clear()
00136    {  
00137       nSample_ = 0; 
00138       nReject_ = 0; 
00139       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00140          histogram_[i] = 0;
00141       }
00142    }
00143    
00144    /* 
00145    * Add a value to the histogram
00146    */
00147    void Distribution::sample(double value)
00148    {
00149       int i;
00150       if (value > min_ && value < max_) {
00151          i = binIndex(value);
00152          histogram_[i] += 1;
00153          nSample_ += 1;
00154       } else {
00155          nReject_ += 1;
00156       }
00157    }
00158    
00159    /* 
00160    * Output histogram
00161    */
00162    void Distribution::output(std::ostream& out) 
00163    {
00164       double x, rho;
00165       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00166          x   = min_ + binWidth_*(double(i) + 0.5);
00167          rho = double(histogram_[i])/double(nSample_);
00168          rho = rho/binWidth_;
00169          out << Dbl(x, 18, 8) << Dbl(rho, 18, 8) << std::endl;
00170       }
00171    }

00177    void Distribution::backup(FILE *file) 
00178    {
00179       fprintf(file, "nSample       %i \n", nSample_);
00180       fprintf(file, "nReject       %i \n", nReject_);
00181       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00182          fprintf(file, "%li ", histogram_[i]);
00183       }
00184       fprintf(file, "\n");

00188    *
00189    */
00190    void Distribution::restore(FILE *file) {
00191       fscanf(file, "nSample       %i \n", &nSample_);
00192       fscanf(file, "nReject       %i \n", &nReject_);
00193       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00194          fscanf(file, "%li ", &histogram_[i]);
00195       }
00196       fscanf(file, "\n");
